tool_description: The StopModReposts Blocklist in different data formats.
name: StopModReposts Blocklist
title: StopModReposts Blocklist

api_list.name: UBLACKLIST.TXT
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stopmodreposts-blocklist.p.rapidapi.com/minecraft/ublacklist.txt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stopmodreposts-blocklist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stopmodreposts-blocklist.p.rapidapi.com/{game}/ublacklist.txt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stopmodreposts-blocklist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
